alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 6:39AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Ransom, west central Richland and Sargent Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 639 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Straubville, or 65 miles south of Valley City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lisbon, Gwinner, Milnor, Forman, Wyndmere, Rutland and Cogswell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
